Section.Catchline: Administration and enforcement; rules; requirements for airport sites and airports.

SectionBody.Text: It is the duty of the department to:

Subsection.Text: Administer and enforce the provisions of this chapter.
Establish requirements for airport site approval, licensure, and registration.
Establish and maintain a state aviation facility data system to facilitate licensing and registration of all airports.
Adopt rules pursuant to ss. 120.536(1) and 120.54 to implement the provisions of this chapter.
